SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.mvp4g.client.annotation
Annotation Type HistoryConfiguration

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface HistoryConfiguration

This annotation allows to define history configuration for the framework.

This annotation can be used only on classes that implement EventBus and that are annotated with @Events.

The annotation has the following attributes:

  • paramSeparator: character that should be used to separate in the history token the event name and the parameters. By default, this parameter is equal to "?". This parameter shouldn't be use in parameter values.
  • paramSeparatorAlwaysAdded (default false): add the separator between the event name and the parameters even if there is no parameter. This parameter has to be set to true if you use "/" to allow the framework to differentiate this the parameter separator from the child modules separator.

    Author:
    plcoirier

    Required Element Summary
     java.lang.String paramSeparator
               
     
    Optional Element Summary
     boolean paramSeparatorAlwaysAdded
               
     

    Element Detail

    paramSeparator

    public abstract java.lang.String paramSeparator

    paramSeparatorAlwaysAdded

    public abstract boolean paramSeparatorAlwaysAdded
    Default:
    false
